questionTitle: Martha <u><font color='red'>could</font></u> not <u><font color='red'>row</font></u> a boat last year, <u><font color='red'>was</font></u> <u><font color='red'>she</font></u>?

the people in our village buy meat every day.

when you take this medicine.
